about_the_game:
This is a must-have BGM set for anyone who wants to create a retro-style game!
The sounds are recorded through actual retro hardware to ensure absolute nostalgic authenticity!

Features:
A pack of BGM and ME reminiscent of 8-bit games popular during the 1980s to early 1990s.
Sounds are sampled from actual retro game hardware.
This BGM set contains enough tracks to get you covered from OP to the ending rolls!


*******************************************
BGM: 18 items each (ogg, ogg no loop)
OP, Title: 2 points
Menu select system: 3 points
General purpose stage system: 8 points
End stage system: 2 points
Boss battle system: 2 points
Ending: 1 point

me: 5 items each (ogg, m4a)

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
